GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.47
GSD.description:
misc/pvpanic: Convert regular spinlock into trylock on panic path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.47 by commit ede2512937539b5f7042be8e6a5fd570c066f5e7, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit b3c0f8774668fd30a3efb2d0afc1a6527dacb858. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc/pvpanic: Convert regular spinlock into trylock on panic path
